testcase.classname: Check app launch when link is clicked
testcase.name: Access the Instagram test page (https://dev.blog.airbridge.io/sdk-qa/) and click the (PlayStore) link. Check whether the ablog app runs when clicked
When you click the Instagram link (https://go.ab180.co/8vpfwh), check if it moves to the store (ablog).
testcase.failure: java.lang.Error: Store page did not open. at org.example.app.steps.LoginSteps.theUserShouldBeLoggedInSuccessfully(LoginSteps.java:57) at ?.Go to the App Store and make sure you are directed to the ablog installation page.(file:///E:/jihye/potpolio/prac3/app/src/test/resources/features/DeepLink_Check.feature:9)
testcase.system-out: When Add "https://go.ab180.co/8vpfwh" link to your profile..................passed And Click on link...........................................................passed And Go to external app Continue Click.......................................passed Then Go to the App Store and make sure you are directed to the ablog installation page..failed
